Package com.pi4j.io.i2c

Class I2CConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pi4j.io.i2c.I2CConstants
  • public class I2CConstants
extends Object
    These are constants scraped directly from linux kernel (i2c-dev.h i2c.h). They are to be used with advanced I2C ioctl.
